'''1.19.31''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on October 4, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/9621393741325|title=Minecraft - 1.19.31 (Bedrock)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=October 4, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Controls ===
* New mobile touch controls: Under Settings > (Controls) > Touch there is a new toggle entitled, Enable New Touch Controls Schemes. When toggled ON, a new Interaction Model dropdown menu will appear, allowing players to use the new Touch scheme, the new Crosshair scheme, or the original Classic scheme.

== Changes ==
* Performance upgrades on Xbox

==Fixes==
*Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
*Fixed terrain on maps getting replaced with black pixels. ({{bug|MCPE-162421}})
*Fixed a bug that unbound the inventory key when using the Full Keyboard Gameplay toggle.
*Fixed players sometimes spawning under the obsidian platform and falling into the void after entering an end portal for the first time after the 1.19.30 update on Realms. ({{bug|MCPE-162482}})
